item.description: Costume Halloween party!! Will have refreshments, karaoke, games and more! Costume contest for BEST costume, scariest, and funniest!!! Games to include: Donuts on a string, worm eating, bobbing for apples!! I hope to see you here! Feel free to bring a snack to share. BYOB. We have a dog for those of you with allergies. Parking will be in our driveway for anyone who can't walk a short distance. Otherwise, parking will be across the street..next drive on the left. We can pick you up if you need us to. Not a problem. We have plenty of room for anyone who needs to spend the night. We potentially have a king sized bed, a couch and an air mattress. IF more need to stay, please bring an air mattress of some sort. We have LOTS AND LOTS OF ROOM!!
item.how_to_find_us: There will be two brick pillars at foot of driveway. Bear to the left up the hill. You will see two green garage doors facing you.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Halloween Costume Party
